scripts.dev:wrangler: wrangler pages dev --proxy 3000 -- npx astro dev
scripts.build:watch: astro build && fswatch src | (while read; do npx astro build; done)
scripts.preview: wrangler pages dev dist --local --compatibility-date=2022-10-27 --live-reload --local-protocol https --log-level debug
scripts.deploy:preview: astro build && wrangler pages publish dist --project-name u0-vc --branch preview --commit-dirty
scripts.deploy:prod: astro build && wrangler pages publish dist --project-name u0-vc --branch main --commit-dirty
